item.title: The Holy Spirit’s Role in John Owen’s “Covenant of the Mediator” Formulation
item.dc:creator: lo
item.description:
The Puritan Reformed Journal has published its past issues in downloadable PDF and e-reader formats. Hence my historical essay on Owen’s formulation of the pactum salutis is now freely available: “The Holy Spirit’s Role in John Owen’s ‘Covenant of the Mediator’ Formulation: A Case Study in Reformed Orthodox Formulations of the Pactum Salutis,” Puritan Reformed Journal 4, no. 1 …

Continue reading "The Holy Spirit’s Role in John Owen’s “Covenant of the Mediator” Formulation"
item.content:encoded:
The Puritan Reformed Journal has published its past issues in downloadable PDF and e-reader formats. Hence my historical essay on Owen’s formulation of the pactum salutis is now freely available:

“The Holy Spirit’s Role in John Owen’s ‘Covenant of the Mediator’ Formulation: A Case Study in Reformed Orthodox Formulations of the Pactum Salutis,” Puritan Reformed Journal 4, no. 1 (2012): 91–115.
